course.long_description:
Here you can find all materials for the PyLadies Vienna Beginners for Ukraine Python Course. All lectures are for complete beginners and taught in English. Instructions are for Linux, Windows and macOS.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us on pyladies.vienna@gmail.com
Our online events are proudly sponspored by
This course is sponsored by as a supportive action for Ukrainian refugees.

materials.title: Have you just made a git mess?
